  • Constructor Details

    • DeployOrder

      public DeployOrder(String p_targetCountry, String p_numOfArmies, Player p_owner) throws EntityNotFoundException, InvalidArgumentException
      Default parameterised constructor.
      Parameters:
      p_targetCountry - Name of target country.
      p_numOfArmies - Number of reinforcements to be deployed.
      p_owner - Player who has initiated this order.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - Throws if the target country not found.
      InvalidArgumentException - Throws if the number of armies is not a number.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute() throws InvalidOrderException
      Executes the order during GameLoopState#EXECUTE_ORDER
      Specified by:
      execute in class Order
      Throws:
      InvalidOrderException - If the order can not be performed due to an invalid country, an invalid number of armies, or other invalid input.

    • expire

      public void expire()
      Reverses the effect of this order or marks it as expired if it has previously been executed.

      This method is intended to be overridden by subclasses to implement logic for undoing or nullifying the effects of an order, typically used for orders with temporary effects.

      Specified by:
      expire in class Order
